DOC.detailed_description: This investigation pilot study investigate potential resveratrol , commercially-available nutritional product , enhance efficacy physical exercise improve physical function among old adult functional limitation . The overarch objective project evaluate safety efficacy intervention combine resveratrol supplementation physical exercise among sedentary person age > 65 year objectively-measured functional impairment . A total 60 participant recruit participate three month intervention study . All participant engage center-based exercise program 3/days per week randomly assign consume 1 ) placebo , 2 ) 250 mg/day resveratrol , 3 ) 1000 mg/day resveratrol . This study provide critical information regard influence combination resveratrol exercise objectively-measured self-assessed index physical function . The study also provide novel biologic information regard relative effect intervention skeletal muscle mitochondrial function .
